title: Revert Landing header to text-based SHAMMAH branding

requirements.summary: Remove broken Butterfly Wellness header image and restore reliable text-based SHAMMAH branding while preserving the header layout with right-aligned Sign In button.
acceptanceCriteria: On the Landing page, the header no longer attempts to load `/assets/branding/butterfly-wellness-wordmark.png`.
The header branding renders reliably (no broken image icon) and matches the previous SHAMMAH branding style (text-based).
The Sign In button remains visible and functional, with no layout regression in the header.

file_operations.description: Update the landing page header branding: remove the that references `/assets/branding/butterfly-wellness-wordmark.png` and replace it with the prior SHAMMAH text-based branding (e.g., prominent SHAMMAH wordmark as text, optional small tagline), keeping the existing header structure (left branding container, right Sign In Button) and ensuring spacing/alignment remains unchanged.
